metadata.synopsis: This younger rothe is trying to rest, but is afraid from the older one's story.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. use Recon command : "loadlevel WLD_Main_A"2. goto -656.42, 10.00, 395.033. Ctrl-K (kill) the Elder RotheYou can now talk to Calf and you will need speak with animal to understand..

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The rothé chews slowly, its eyes drooping from exhaustion.*
0.context: NodeContext: Sad. Very young and frail sounding.

1.speaker: Deep Rothé Calf
1.context: NodeContext: Sad. Very young and frail sounding.
